article: I have tried many ways to be _ . I don't wear a sweater when I _ , and two days ago I walked in the _ without my shoes. But so far nothing _ . Debbie once told me about a boy in her class who liked _ school. He would rub the end of the thermometer until it went _ to 39 degrees. Then he'd put it in his mouth and his mother would think he was _ ill.This morning I tried doing that but it _ went above 35 degrees and I rubbed it for ten _ . So I held the thermometer _ the light on my desk and it went up to 40 degrees. I thought I'd put it in my mouth and walk downstairs like that. _ my mother would take it out and she would be _ when she saw that I was rather ill.The only trouble was I didn't know the thermometer would be so _ , As soon as I put it into my mouth I burnt my tongue ! I spit the thermometer out. It fell _ the floor but it _ .
